description: Fill up an infinite triangular array by rows by successively writing numbers 1, then 1 up to 2*3/2, then 1 up to 3*4/2, then 1 up to 4*5/2 and so on, at the k-th step writing the numbers from 1 up to the k-th triangular number. The final elements of the rows of this infinite triangle form the sequence.
